phrases: I was on my way to pick up the uniform I ordered,
but I could not find the shop,
so I have been wandering around all morning.
The croquette place by the station.
Hey, guys, are you okay with me calling you by your first names?
What are you doing now, Sakai-san?
I would like if it you all called me by my first name.
You were singing, were not you?
Sakai-san, will you come over to my house for a bit?
I will be back by dinner.
You have got to eat a lot, so you can grow up big and strong.
Thank you for having me over.
Thank you for having me over.
So, Okita-san, is this temple your house?
And you can call me Sawa.
It is a recording of last year's recital.
She was so nervous, she could not sing.
If you were too nervous to actually sing,
The end result was a huge failure,
but I like what you did.
It makes me laugh, every time.
Hey, Sakai-san, can we put your name down for the new choir club?
She does not want this to be her last time singing,
so she is been practicing hard all year.
No matter how slight her chances, I want to support her.
We need at least five people to start a club.
You do not have to actually participate, if you do not want to.
Push too hard, and she will just get mad again.
If you just need my name, sure.
And they wear the weirdest outfits on our days off.
Right now, it is just me and my sister at home,
so there is no one around to cook a decent meal.
Thinly-sliced meat, cooked with vegetables in a light-but-savory sauce...
This is none other than sukiyaki!
Listen, let us eat, and then we will go buy you a better book.
Why do not you get your little brother to make his friends join?
The dancing violinist Kumagai Tetsuji will be there,
so you could try to recruit people who would join because of him.
He has a very weird style.
And we could get Shiho-san to make us some flyers.
You know she is going to go completely overboard.
My mom gets asked to make illustrations and flyers all the time.
Well, her drawings really pack a punch!
I want you to invite your friends to join my choir club.
Moving your porn stash to a new hiding spot will not help.
Choir Club Join the Choir Club and meet Kumagai Tetsuji!
We are starting a new choir club.
It is for our choir club.
I will make the announcement at the next board meeting.
Is there a problem with the current choir program?
Well, I am not allowed to sing.
and it will not be like the other choir.
I want to perform at the recital with a completely new concept.
I am sure it will create a big
I am sure the vice principal has her own ideas.
Performing at the joint recital with a random group is...
Club Application Choir Club Sakai Wakana
It might also be a good incentive for some of the top hitters in the music program.
Would I be acceptable as advisor?
I have always had faith in the potential of my young students.
That is the kind of man I am.
Each and every arrow is important, you know.
When does the new choir club start up?
So, I want to choose our song right away,
but looking at sheet music is not giving me any ideas.
I also cannot choose a song that only I know.
But I was hoping to have a song we could start practicing tomorrow...
It is a mandatory part of the music curriculum.
Although, I am not as good as the piano majors.
Sakai-san, I know we said you would be a member in name only,
but could you help us out the next two days, while we choose a song?
What about the actual recital, and your rehearsals?
My brother's asking a friend of his, who plays the electone, as we speak,
but I want to pick a song and start practicing, as soon as possible!
I will buy you a cake!
All right, can you play through these in order?
You just want to get the feel of them, right?
It is kind of strange, huh?
There are scribbles all over it.
I have never heard it before, and the music was even written by hand.
It reminds me of the Condor Queens.
They are a pretty old band.
I will lend you one of their CDs some time.
Play it again, right from the beginning.
this is the song I would like us to perform at the recital.
I have got cram school, so I cannot stay too late.
Why do not you all submit the times that are good for you to me?
but we will rehearse as hard as we can, so we can blow them away!
I cannot allow you to sing this song.
You will have to select something else.
This is not a song you can sing for the fun of it.
but it is like I can feel how much the composer enjoyed writing it.
It is very straightforward and sincere.
You can tell the composer loves to sing, and yet there is also joy...
I feel like it incorporates everything I am feeling right now.
And that is why I want to sing it.
Enjoying something and bringing joy are different things.
You are incapable of bringing those two together.
A fresh wind races through the grass and leaves.
The view is clear, as far as the eye can see.
And now, a graceful light is flooding...
If you do not have anyone supervising you, you will need to go back to your classes.
Participation in club activities without an advisor's
or assistant advisor's supervision is prohibited.
As club president, I am sure you know this rule.
I will try to get in touch with her.
Since you will need to stay here with your club to await further news,
you will have to appoint someone to lead the afternoon rehearsal in your place.
She said you are the only one who can do it.
I wrote down everyone is parts and their positions.
Call me if you have any problems.
I will let you know how things are going on our side, too.
I will go to her house.
If the principal shows up, pick me up on the way with the bus.
I am starting to feel a little nervous.
You must be one of Tomoko's students.
She just went to the hospital for a check-up.
Can you tell me which hospital?
They just found the principal, but I am not sure what is going on.
I am here with Mr. Tada...
Okay, I will be there soon!
And I just had it waxed!
That is the kind of man I am.
But I called the school and arranged for the bus to leave,
so I think we will make it, somehow.
Then we will go to the auditorium.
I am at the hospital, so...
Could you please let the choir club sing last?
They said they are on their way and will definitely make it.
I know it is asking a lot to change the program last-minute...
I just got a call from the principal.
Though I do not want to, I will put your club after the voice majors.
This is really cutting it close.
Where is the rest of your group?
Do you want us to crash?!
This is not going to be like last year!
Next up, we have the Shirohamazaki High School Choir Club performing Melody of the Heart.
Is everyone else already out there?
We have finally cleared the congestion, so it should not be long.
How is it going over there?
Are we going to make it?
I will tell them you are not going on.
You get all these people involved, and now you just want to quit and go home?!
I have got to overwrite last year's shame!
I do not care if I make a fool of myself.
I have to see this through!
Thanks for all your help, Sakai-san.
I am going to find the answer you wanted last time.
We have just got to get through one song.
Just imagine you are looking at a pumpkin patch.
I have never seen a pumpkin patch...
I think I owe her three cakes now.
All right, let us do this.
A fresh wind races through the grass and leaves.
The view is clear, as far as the eye can see.
And now, a graceful light is flooding,
Even if you cannot see the stars
the future you are dreaming of
our song echoing to the skies,
the days we spent with beaming smiles.
our song echoing to the skies,
the days we spent with sparkling eyes.
The days we spent with beaming smiles.
I will be hospitalized for a while,
so you will have to take over my duties for the time being.
If we do this, I want to win.
But if I win, both of you have to join the badminton club.
